welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pasay City, where the vibrant culture, warm hospitality, and stunning sunsets await you. Explore the city's iconic landmarks, delicious cuisine, and lively atmosphere, and make unforgettable memories during your stay.

restaurants.name: Spiral
restaurants.description: Spiral is a buffet located in Pasay.
restaurants.address: G/F Sofitel Philippine Plaza, CCP Complex, Atang dela Rama St, 1300 Pasay City, Pasay City
